description:
Conan, Ran, and Kogoro visit Moonshade Island off the coast of Izu. The previous mayor`s second anniversary memorial service was held at the community center. During their stay, the Moonlight Sonata begins playing, and the current mayor is found dead. At the crime scene is a musical score written in blood, and Conan reads the message left behind by the killer...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le meurtre de la Sonate au clair de lune (2e partie)
ピアノソナタ『月光』殺人事件 (後編)
